path.style: transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; stroke: rgb(203, 4, 4); fill: rgb(56, 4, 14); stroke-opacity: 0;
stroke: rgb(203, 4, 4); fill: rgb(56, 4, 14); stroke-opacity: 0; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
stroke: rgb(244, 99, 30); fill: rgb(100, 13, 20); stroke-opacity: 0; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
stroke: rgb(244, 99, 30); fill: rgb(100, 13, 20); transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; fill-rule: nonzero; stroke: rgb(244, 99, 30); fill: rgb(100, 13, 20); stroke-opacity: 0;
transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; stroke: rgb(224, 156, 123); fill: rgb(56, 4, 14); stroke-opacity: 0;
